entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
